Package me.mayhem.screens

Interface ScreenManager

All Known Implementing Classes:
EndGameScreenManager, EscapeScreenManager, GameScreenManager, HomePageManager, LoadPageManager, LoseScreenManager, NameSelectScreen, NewGameSettingsPageManager, TutorialManager, WinScreenManager
public interface ScreenManager
Screen manager interface for handling the different screens the game passes through

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void close​(org.jsfml.graphics.RenderWindow renderWindow)
    closes the given renderwindow so that it is not used anymore
    void draw​(org.jsfml.graphics.RenderWindow renderWindow)
    Draws items onto a given renderwindow
    org.jsfml.audio.Sound getSound()
    gets the sound varaible for each screen manager instance
    void loadScreen​(org.jsfml.graphics.RenderWindow renderWindow)
    loads items onto a render window
    void unloadScreen​(org.jsfml.graphics.RenderWindow renderWindow)
    unloads items from a renderwindow

  • Method Details

    • loadScreen

      void loadScreen​(org.jsfml.graphics.RenderWindow renderWindow)
      loads items onto a render window
      Parameters:
      renderWindow - is the renderwindow that is to be loaded onto

    • unloadScreen

      void unloadScreen​(org.jsfml.graphics.RenderWindow renderWindow)
      unloads items from a renderwindow
      Parameters:
      renderWindow - is the renderwindow that is to be unloaded

    • draw

      void draw​(org.jsfml.graphics.RenderWindow renderWindow)
      Draws items onto a given renderwindow
      Parameters:
      renderWindow - is the renderwindow to draw items onto

    • close

      void close​(org.jsfml.graphics.RenderWindow renderWindow)
      closes the given renderwindow so that it is not used anymore
      Parameters:
      renderWindow - the renderwindow that is to be closed

    • getSound

      org.jsfml.audio.Sound getSound()
      gets the sound varaible for each screen manager instance
      Returns:
      the sound variable containing the main theme
